mapper.select:
SELECT H.HST_NO, H.HST_RSV_TITLE, H.HST_DATE, H.HST_TOTAL_TIME, H.HST_START_TIME, H.HST_END_TIME, C.CONF_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_NM, H.HST_RSV_MEM_PN, H.HST_RSV_MEM_EM, H.HST_DEL_PWD, H.HST_REG_DATE, H.HST_RSV_STATE, H.HST_REPEAT_PERIOD, H.HST_SETTING, H.HST_REPEAT_NO
FROM HISTORY H, CONFERENCE C WHERE H.HST_CONF_NO = C.CONF_NO AND H.HST_DATE <= #{deleteDate} ORDER BY H.HST_REPEAT_NO ASC, H.HST_DATE ASC

choose.when: INSERT INTO HISTORY (HST_RSV_COMP,HST_RSV_TITLE,HST_DATE,HST_TOTAL_TIME,HST_START_TIME,HST_END_TIME,HST_RSV_STATE,HST_RSV_MEM_NM,HST_RSV_MEM_PN,HST_RSV_MEM_EM,HST_DEL_PWD,HST_REG_DATE,HST_CONF_NO,HST_REPEAT_PERIOD,HST_SETTING,HST_REPEAT_NO,HST_DESCRIPTION) select RSV_COMP,RSV_TITLE,RSV_DATE,RSV_TOTAL_TIME,RSV_START_TIME,RSV_END_TIME,'REJECTED',RSV_MEM_NM,RSV_MEM_PN,RSV_MEM_EM,RSV_DEL_PWD,RSV_REG_DATE,RSV_CONF_NO,RSV_REPEAT_PERIOD,RSV_SETTING,RSV_REPEAT_NO,RSV_DESCRIPTION FROM RESERVATION WHERE RSV_CONFIRM_STATE='N' AND RSV_REPEAT_NO=#{repeatNo};
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO HISTORY (HST_RSV_COMP,HST_RSV_TITLE,HST_DATE,HST_TOTAL_TIME,HST_START_TIME,HST_END_TIME,HST_RSV_STATE,HST_RSV_MEM_NM,HST_RSV_MEM_PN,HST_RSV_MEM_EM,HST_DEL_PWD,HST_REG_DATE,HST_CONF_NO,HST_REPEAT_PERIOD,HST_SETTING,HST_REPEAT_NO,HST_DESCRIPTION) select RSV_COMP,RSV_TITLE,RSV_DATE,RSV_TOTAL_TIME,RSV_START_TIME,RSV_END_TIME,'REJECTED',RSV_MEM_NM,RSV_MEM_PN,RSV_MEM_EM,RSV_DEL_PWD,RSV_REG_DATE,RSV_CONF_NO,RSV_REPEAT_PERIOD,RSV_SETTING,RSV_REPEAT_NO,RSV_DESCRIPTION FROM RESERVATION WHERE RSV_CONFIRM_STATE='N' AND RSV_NO=#{reservationNo};

choose.when: INSERT INTO HISTORY (HST_RSV_COMP,HST_RSV_TITLE,HST_DATE,HST_TOTAL_TIME,HST_START_TIME,HST_END_TIME,HST_RSV_STATE,HST_RSV_MEM_NM,HST_RSV_MEM_PN,HST_RSV_MEM_EM,HST_DEL_PWD,HST_REG_DATE,HST_CONF_NO,HST_REPEAT_PERIOD,HST_SETTING,HST_REPEAT_NO,HST_DESCRIPTION) select RSV_COMP,RSV_TITLE,RSV_DATE,RSV_TOTAL_TIME,RSV_START_TIME,RSV_END_TIME,'ACCEPT',RSV_MEM_NM,RSV_MEM_PN,RSV_MEM_EM,RSV_DEL_PWD,RSV_REG_DATE,RSV_CONF_NO,RSV_REPEAT_PERIOD,RSV_SETTING,RSV_REPEAT_NO,RSV_DESCRIPTION FROM RESERVATION WHERE RSV_CONFIRM_STATE='N' AND RSV_REPEAT_NO=#{repeatNo};

mapper.select: SELECT * ,RSV_NO as LAST_DATE FROM RESERVATION r,CONFERENCE c WHERE r.RSV_REPEAT_NO=0 and r.RSV_CONFIRM_STATE='N' AND r.RSV_CONF_NO=c.CONF_NO UNION ALL SELECT * ,max(RSV_DATE) as LAST_DATE FROM RESERVATION r,CONFERENCE c WHERE RSV_REPEAT_NO!=0 AND r.RSV_CONF_NO=c.CONF_NO AND r.RSV_CONFIRM_STATE='N' GROUP BY RSV_REPEAT_NO ;
SELECT * FROM RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c WHERE RSV_REPEAT_NO!=0 AND r.RSV_CONF_NO=c.CONF_NO GROUP BY RSV_REPEAT_NO;

SELECT r.RSV_DATE, r.RSV_START_TIME, r.RSV_END_TIME, r.RSV_TITLE, r.RSV_MEM_NM, r.RSV_CONFIRM_STATE, r.RSV_REPEAT_PERIOD, r.RSV_REPEAT_NO, c.CONF_NM, r.RSV_DESCRIPTION FROM RESERVATION r, CONFERENCE c WHERE RSV_CONFIRM_STATE = 'N' AND RSV_REPEAT_NO=#{repeatNo} AND r.RSV_CONF_NO=c.CONF_NO;
